name: The Curious Adventures of Ant, the Inebriated Ant
name_original: The Curious Adventures of Ant, the Inebriated Ant
description:
Help Ant get home after a night of hard drinking.

My entry to Ludum Dare 38 compo.

Instructions:

Arrow keys to move, "up" to jump. Hold left or right and repeatedly press jump to stick and climb up walls. Use Ant's wall-sticking abilities to climb over the obstacles and reach the goal for each level to move on to the next one.

If you get stuck in a level, press "R" or click the Reset button to bring Ant back to the start of the level.

Since this is a compo entry, I've also uploaded the Unity 5.6 project file for this game (all code and assets included).
